item.description:
The Sounds of Concord will be giving a special short class from 7 to 7:30 on the the Beach Boys' song "In My Room", which is part of our active repertoire. We will teach all 4 parts, tenor, lead, baritone and bass.

This is particularly suitable for guests who have visited us before, and may want to stay for the evening.

ALL singers are welcome, whether you have visited us before or not.
item.how_to_find_us: Take stairs to second floor, turn left, and follow the corridor. We are in large room on left.

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: Practice the Beach Boys' song "In My Room"
